testcase.name: Check Turn On/Off Notifications Button Exists
testcase.system-out: Given the user opens the application........................................passed And the user is logged in...................................................passed When the user clicks on the "Menu" in the navbar............................passed Then the user sees the "Turn OnOff Notifications" in the Menu...............passed

testcase.name: Check Successful Turning Off Notifications
testcase.system-out: Given the user opens the application........................................passed And the user is logged in...................................................passed And the user opens the notifications........................................passed And the user sees a "Order" notification text...............................passed And the user closes the notifications.......................................passed When the user clicks on the "Menu" in the navbar............................passed And the user clicks on the "Turn OnOff Notifications" text in the Menu......passed And the user switches notifications status..................................passed And the user clicks on the "Go Back To Application From Settings" image button.passed And the user closes the menu................................................passed And the user sees the "Welcome" screen......................................passed And the user opens the notifications........................................passed Then the user sees that the "Order" notification doesnt exist...............passed

testcase.name: Check Successful Turning On Notifications
testcase.system-out: Given the user opens the application........................................passed And the user closes the notifications.......................................passed And the user is logged in...................................................passed And the user has the notifications turned off...............................passed When the user opens the notifications.......................................passed And the user sees that the "Order" notification doesnt exist................passed Then the user closes the notifications......................................passed And the user clicks on the "Menu" in the navbar.............................passed And the user clicks on the "Turn OnOff Notifications" text in the Menu......passed And the user switches notifications status..................................passed And the user clicks on the "Go Back To Application From Settings" image button.passed And the user closes the menu................................................passed And the user opens the notifications........................................passed And the user sees a "Order" notification text...............................passed
